# Streamlit

Streamlit is an open-source Python library that makes it easy to create and share custom web apps for machine learning and data science.

## Example Application

An example Streamlit application that connects to the AdventureWorks database and displays key performance indicators (KPIs) and AI-generated insights using Gemini can be found in this GitHub repository:

- [GitHub Repo](https://github.com/kirenz/streamlit-mssql)
